document_data.name: Tower Chûmavhraele
document_data.mainbody: '''Tower Chûmavhraele''' was a [[drow]]-controlled castle located in the [[Deep Wastes]] of the [[Underdark]] beneath the city of [[Ravens Bluff]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. The castle was home to the drow clan [[House Chûmavh]], led by the Marquise [[Dresimil Chûmavh]].{{Cite digital book/Prince of Ravens/Kindle|1595}} The castle was constructed some time between [[1367 DR]] and [[1479 DR]].<ref>{{Cite digital book/Prince of Ravens/Kindle||1}}
document_data.Description: The castle was an imposing structure in a huge cavern that also contained an ancient drow-built [[mythal]]. The castle was surrounded by forests of huge [[mushroom]]s the size of trees as well as paddocks where [[rothe]] were raised.{{Cite digital book/Prince of Ravens/Kindle|340|2}} The interior of the castle had the typical chambers one would expect to find in a castle, such as dungeon cells and a kitchen. It also had a huge throne room with a spider-shaped throne.{{Cite digital book/Prince of Ravens/Kindle|4419|12}}
document_data.Inhabitants: In addition to the drow elves, Castle Chûmavhraele was home to [[slave]]s of many races.{{Cite digital book/Prince of Ravens/Kindle|360|2}}
